Html:
Hello all,

I was excited to find that the HAP supports mixed content, e.g. the actual file contents of an aspx or ascx file.  This is precisely what I need for an internal tool that parses these files to find all text elements.  However, I downloaded the 1.4 stable version of the source and tried to use HAP to parse a rather simple ascx file and bam, I get a StackOverflowException.  This brings me to the questions -

Does the HAP actually support parsing ascx, or even aspx files?  Has anybody had success with this?  Should I try a later version?

Thanks.

one year later. I have the same question :D
can you help meeeee
